name: Casa Manoli
address: Calle Vara del Rey 32, Logroño, España
description: Spanish cuisine as opposed to other national cuisines in Europe, is heavily influenced by regional cuisines and the particular historical processes that shaped culture and society in those territories. Geography and climate, had great influence on cooking methods and available ingredients, and these particularities are still present in the gastronomy of the various regions that make up the country.

reviews.name: Pepa
reviews.comment: This is one of my favourite restaurants, the food is great and the service is so nice.

name: Mamma Mia
address: Via di S. Giovanni in Laterano, 88, 00184 Roma, Italy
description: Pizza is a flatbread generally topped with tomato sauce and cheese and baked in an oven. It is commonly topped with a selection of meats, vegetables and condiments. The term was first recorded in the 10th century, in a Latin manuscript from Gaeta in Central Italy. The modern pizza was invented in Naples, Italy, and the dish and its variants have since become popular in many areas of the world.

name: Hapiness
description: Chinese cuisine includes styles originating from the diverse regions of China, as well as from Chinese people in other parts of the world including most Asian nations. The history of Chinese cuisine in China stretches back for thousands of years and has changed from period to period and in each region according to climate, imperial fashions, and local preferences.

reviews.name: Marta
reviews.comment: Nice rice and nice Pekin duck, good service, the decorations are terrible.

name: Marisqueria Los Mellizos
description: Seafood is any form of sea life regarded as food by humans. Seafood prominently includes fish and shellfish. Shellfish include various species of molluscs, crustaceans, and echinoderms.

reviews.name: John Troll
reviews.comment: This a terrible restaurant, I do not like pizza.

name: Vegan Burgers
description: Veganism is both the practice of abstaining from the use of animal products, particularly in diet, and an associated abolitionist philosophy that rejects the commodity status of animals. A follower of either the diet or the philosophy is known as a vegan.

name: A Restaurant
description: Voluptas aut et omnis voluptatem. Ut voluptas vel culpa incidunt soluta in qui quasi. Autem ut enim velit illo nisi. Natus veritatis consequuntur earum. Esse molestiae repudiandae ipsa nisi.
